subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What is PayStems and how does it simplify payment operations?
faqs.answer: PayStems is a payment orchestration platform for online businesses and payment institutions. We are a Technology Service Provider (TSP) to merchants, not a payments intermediary. As a TSP, PayStems provides software for seamless checkout, routing, analytics, tokenization, and authentication, fully compliant with payment industry standards. When merchants partner with us, our technology seamlessly integrates into their tech stack, and our team functions as an extension of theirs. The business relationship involves merchants and the PA for payment processing and settlement, while merchants engage separately with PayStems for payment orchestration. Merchants can continue using the software of their choice and we are open to any further customizations, in this regard, based on merchant feedback.

faqs.question: Why choose PayStems payment orchestration platform?
faqs.answer: PayStems payment orchestration platform is software for online businesses and payment institutions that aim to streamline their payments and payouts and adjust their payment process management. By integrating one payment gateway, companies get all the necessary tools to accept payments, make payouts , and manage all transactions efficiently in one place.

faqs.question: Is PayStems a financial services provider?
faqs.answer: We do not provide financial services and do not hold our clients' funds. That's why PayStems is not required to be registered or authorised by The Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). We integrate numerous payment service providers (PSPs) globally so that our services are available wherever PSPs work. We provide a unified technical infrastructure and a single interface to manage all your payment activity across multiple vendors.

faqs.question: What do we need to start working with PayStems?
faqs.answer: Your company needs to have direct contracts with financial companies and PSPs and a business bank account. Once you have it, you're all set to integrating with us. The process consists of the following steps: the signing of a contract; onboarding and training; and API integration. On average, it takes 1-2 weeks to get you live with PayStems.

faqs.question: Is it safe for my business to work with PayStems?
faqs.answer: We ensure the safety, stability, and reliability of our payment platform. PayStems is validated by the industry’s highest level of certification — The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) Level 1. We do regular internal audits and facilitate independent security assessments by authorised third parties. PayStems also adheres to the requirements of ISO 9001 that specifies requirements for a Quality Management System (QMS) and ISO 27001 for Applications, Systems, People, Technology, and Processes. We run our business in full compliance with PSD2 and GDPR, continuously looking for opportunities to enhance the overall security of the platform and the safety of sensitive data.

faqs.question: What is your hosting provider??
faqs.answer: PayStems payment platform runs entirely on Amazon Web Services (AWS), one of the global leaders in cloud computing. Using AWS grants access to a world-class infrastructure that helps to scale seamlessly and increase developer productivity. One of the key advantages AWS gives us is the unlimited server capacity. For our clients, it means the stability and scalability of our platform regardless of the load.

faqs.question: Who are your clients?
faqs.answer: We provide a complete set of cloud payment data processing services in a diverse set of industries, including, but not limited to: Payment & Money Institutions, that benefit from our solutions. Cryptocurrency projects, mostly exchanges and wallet providers. Fintech applications. Freelance platforms. Marketplaces. Gambling & Betting businesses.

faqs.question: What is PayStems vision for interoperable payments?
faqs.answer: We believe that fostering interoperability and merchant choice is crucial for a thriving payments ecosystem. PayStems, along with a large number of PA/PGs, remains committed to empowering merchants with flexible, and independent payment solutions that drive long-term industry growth. We strongly encourage collaboration across the industry to foster innovation and better experiences for both businesses and consumers. We envision a future where payments function like the operating system, secure, and universally accessible. At PayStems, we remain committed to empowering merchants, advancing payment technology, and fostering a truly inclusive digital economy.
